Text: P-Please wait! Thrashing about like that will only... Kyah!
Yes... had the waters been deeper, this body would not have risen... and together, we would have sunk to the riverbed.
But it is thanks to you that I was able to rise from the river. My deepest thanks, Kishi-sama.
Yes. For now, let us return to a place where the sun shines.
...Kishi-sama? You are preparing a fire... but whatever for?
Th-That is... My deepest apologies, Kishi-sama.
I appreciate the sentiment, but... the coldness you felt... is not because of what just happened. It is because I am an undead.
...B-But truly, your concern delights me! And even if my body feels no ill, my garments must still be dried.
So... umm... I... wish to take off my clothes. Forgive me, but might I trouble you for assistance...?
Thank you... ordinarily, I rely on Lului and the others for such things, so...
Yes, umm... if you would but undo the buttons at my back, that will suffice. The rest, I can manage alone...
Huh...? You want to lend me your jacket...? N-No, that is... for a lady to borrow a gentleman's garment... is that not shameless...?
...Then, I shall accept your kindness. Umm... Thank you very much, Kishi-sama...
And so, Violet and {playername} sat in silence for a time, drying their clothes.
Forgive me, for having shown you something so unseemly before... Mmm...
Even if it was but my back... to bare my skin before a gentleman, before Kishi-sama himself... I could die of shame...! I only pray there were no scars upon it...
...Yet the coat I borrowed from Kishi-sama was so very warm...
And the hand he offered me in the water just before... All that Kishi-sama bestows is steeped in warmth.
It is as if I have been waiting impatiently for that hand all this time... Could this be... another memory of my past...?
...In the first place, what was it that I felt in the water earlier...?
Y-Yes! ...Um, Kishi-sama? That fish in your hand... is it...
Kishi-sama... You must have been worried about what I said back then all this time...
...Thank you. Then I shall partake, as you so kindly offer.
In Landosol... I assume this is how you eat fishes?
We do not get many "living" fishes in Gio Nivlhel. Besides, when it comes to cooking them with fire... well, all we really have are will-o'-the-wisps.
In our world, many beings like ghosts and zombies can go without eating day after day... Perhaps that is why meals are so irregular, and cooking so haphazard.
However... that is merely the way of Gio Nivlhel. Right now, I too would like to try this fish.
If I could... I would eat until I was full.
Well then, time to dig in... Hamph...
...Hamph, hamph... Delicious...
Fresh... the flesh of a fish that was alive only moments ago, grilled to perfection. Plump, tender... simple, and yet so very delicious...
As I feared, I am unable to eat like Kishi-sama does... Yet I can savor it all the same.
Though my body is cold, I can still love living things, feel joy, and share in their emotions...
If these feelings I bear for Kishi-sama cannot be restrained... then at the very least, I wish to draw closer to him...
With hands that share his warmth... I want to touch him...!
Yes. I am sure that even Grace is worried for us by now. But... I am sure that the road ahead will be fine.
Violet became aware of the wish stirring within her. Though she knew it would not be easily fulfilled, a glimmer of hope for the future had begun to shine in her eyes.
*Tôi nắm lấy tay Violet*
*Tôi cố gắng chống đỡ để nổi lên mặt nước*
May mà nước không sâu...
Chúng ta về trại thôi
Tay em lạnh quá, Violet
Vì vậy em phải sưởi ấm cẩn thận mới được...
Violet...?
Tôi nướng nó luôn rồi, muốn ăn không...?
Ở Gio Nivlhel, mấy người không ăn cá sống sao?
Ăn xong chúng ta về lâu đài thôi
Ngày công chúa Violet trở về Gio Nivlhel sau nhiệm vụ ở Landosol, nó đã mời {playername} đến một buổi tiệc trà để bày tỏ lòng biết ơn.
Cho phép tôi cảm ơn anh một lần nữa, Kishi-sama -- không chỉ vì dẫn tôi đi xem Landosol, mà còn vì hộ tống tôi suốt đường về Lâu Đài Cá voi Lớn.
Thế giới của anh còn tuyệt vời hơn những gì tôi được nghe. Người dân tràn đầy sinh khí, cây cỏ tươi mát rực rỡ... và những chú mèo thì đơn giản là đáng yêu quá đi.
